about.title: About Us
about.description: Meet Chef Isabella Martinez, CIA graduate and creator of Mini Recipe. Learn her inspiring journey from single mom to celebrated chef, developing perfectly portioned recipes that eliminate food waste and bring joy to home cooking.

openGraph.title: Meet Chef Isabella Martinez - Creator of Mini Recipe
openGraph.description: From CIA graduate to single mom chef, discover Isabella's inspiring journey creating perfectly portioned recipes that eliminate waste and bring joy to home cooking.

images.alt: Mini Recipe - Small batch cooking for busy women

hero.title: Meet Chef Isabella
hero.subtitle: Creator of Mini Recipe
hero.description: **CIA graduate turned busy mom** - creating **perfectly portioned recipes** that eliminate waste and bring joy to your kitchen.

chef.name: Isabella Martinez
chef.description: I'm an passionate chef with a culinary mind behind Mini Recipe. My passion for cooking was born in the heart of my mother's kitchen, where the aroma of fresh herbs, the warmth of family recipes, and the joy of sharing meals inspired my journey. Here, I bring you recipes crafted with love, flavor, and a touch of culinary tradition.
story: Hi there! I'm Isabella, the chef, passionate foodie, and flavor enthusiast behind Mini Recipe. My love affair with cooking began as a young mom, standing beside my mother in the kitchen, fascinated by the way she turned fresh, simple ingredients into unforgettable meals that brought our family together. Those moments planted the seed for what has grown into my greatest passion: creating food that's not just delicious but a celebration of life.

After graduating from the Culinary Institute of America in 2018, I worked in high-end restaurants where I learned precision and technique. But it wasn't until I became a mom that I truly understood the challenge of home cooking - especially cooking for smaller households without waste.

Every Mini Recipe reflects my belief that great food doesn't require waste. Whether you're cooking for yourself, your partner, or introducing your kids to new flavors, these perfectly portioned recipes ensure every ingredient has purpose and every meal brings joy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the Mini Recipe team. Share your small recipe ideas, ask questions about portion sizes, or tell us about your zero-waste cooking journey.

openGraph.title: Contact Us
openGraph.description: Get in touch with our team. We'd love to hear about your small recipe journey!

hero.title: Let's Connect!
hero.description: **Questions? Recipe ideas? Kitchen triumphs?** Share your mini recipe journey with us - we'd love to hear from you!

contactInfo.title: Contact information
contactInfo.description: Have a question, suggestion, or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out to me via email at contact@minirecipe.com. I'm always excited to connect with fellow food lovers and hear about your kitchen triumphs!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Mini Recipe collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Complete privacy policy covering cookies, analytics, advertising, and your data rights under GDPR and CCPA.

openGraph.title: Privacy Policy - Mini Recipe
openGraph.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and personal information when you visit Mini Recipe.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At Mini Recipe, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services to discover small-portion recipes and sustainable cooking practices.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following personal information when you interact with our website:

subsections.title: Personal Information
items: Email address (when you subscribe to our newsletter)
Name (if provided when leaving comments or contacting us)

subsections.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: Pages visited and time spent on our website
Search terms used to find our recipes

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our website and mini recipe services
Send you our newsletter with new small-portion recipes (with your consent)
Respond to your comments, questions, and recipe requests
Improve our website and develop better portion-control recipes
Analyze website usage and cooking trends
Personalize your experience and show relevant content
Prevent fraud and ensure website security

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, want to exercise your privacy rights, or have concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us:

contact.note: For privacy requests, please use email contact above
contact.responseTime: We will respond to your privacy requests within 30 days.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using Mini Recipe website and services. Learn about acceptable use policies, content guidelines, and user responsibilities.

openGraph.title: Terms of Service - Mini Recipe
openGraph.description: Terms and conditions for using Mini Recipe website and services.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Mini Recipe website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: Use of Service
sections.content: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that violates applicable laws or these terms of service.

sections.title: Content and Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content on Mini Recipe, including recipes, images, text, graphics, and logos, is protected by intellectual property laws. Personal use is permitted, but commercial use requires written permission.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@minirecipe.net.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Important disclaimer information about Mini Recipe content, recipe accuracy, health considerations, and nutritional information. Please read before using our recipes.

openGraph.title: Disclaimer - Mini Recipe
openGraph.description: Important information about using Mini Recipe content and recipes safely.

sections.title: General Information
sections.content: The information provided on Mini Recipe is for general informational and educational purposes only. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date recipes and cooking information, we make no warranties or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content on this website.

sections.title: Recipe Usage & Safety
sections.content: All recipes on Mini Recipe are provided 'as is' and are intended for informational purposes only. Always follow proper food safety guidelines, check ingredients for allergens, and use your best judgment regarding substitutions.

sections.title: Health & Dietary Considerations
sections.content: Mini Recipe content is not intended to provide medical or dietary advice. If you have food allergies, medical conditions requiring dietary restrictions, or special nutritional needs, please consult with a qualified healthcare professional.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us at hello@minirecipe.net.

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use
terms-of-use.description: Terms of use for Mini Recipe website. Learn about acceptable use policies, content guidelines, user responsibilities, and website usage rules.

openGraph.title: Terms of Use - Mini Recipe

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Mini Recipe website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: Website Usage
sections.content: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that violates applicable laws, restricts others' use, or engages in harmful conduct.

sections.title: Content Usage and Intellectual Property
sections.content: The content on Mini Recipe is protected by intellectual property laws. You may use recipes for personal, non-commercial purposes and share recipe links with proper attribution, but may not copy or republish substantial portions without permission.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at hello@minirecipe.net.
